message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, with me getting the bigger share since we're starting the second round. Let's get this over with.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting me, and this will only drag on. I propose a 50/50 split - anything less is just wasting both of our time.
